title: Any update on the Ranked 5's queue?
body: Would any rioters out there be able to give us an estimate on how much longer 5's are going to be down? Also, will the LP that we should have gained when lp gains broke be added to our teams LP?

replies.body:
It is entirely possible that ranked teams won't be enabled until Season 5 starts which will also initiate the LCS for each region. 
Season 5 should start around mid January as Season 4 started no the 14th this year. But if this doesn't help you I'm sure Mirkinen will help if he's lurking.

Regards,
lols =)
LOLS your are becoming one of my favourite poster, thank  you for always trying to be positive, constructive and informative.

Are you feeling okay?
Is this positive posting I see before me?

Keep it up son!
